fields.summary: Cannot set property services.imaging.worker.image due to "failed to describe images"

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

comments.body: Is this to fix the logging or is there an underlying error to fix? (May be related to the file system being full on the scale system.)
Change log level to debug rather than error unless we see actual functional errors resulting from this.
This issue is due to an error in the error handling path and is not version specific.

To test this, I tried to create a volume while turning off the SC:

(example):

euca-create-volume -s 30 -z scale &  euserv-modify-service -U http://10.112.10.5:8773/services/Empyrean -s STOPPED scale-sc-0

I got an error back: euca-create-volume: error (InternalError): Action:ProblemAction Code:soapenv:Client Id:RelatesTo Error: 307 Temporary RedirectNo content

Instead of Failed to marshall response
Moving 4.4.0 Issues from Release Pending to Resolved
